mapper.update: merge into user_test a using (select #{uuid} uuid, #{uname} uname, #{sex} sex, #{age} age, '1' flag from dual) b on (a.uuid = b.uuid) when matched then update set a.uname = b.uname, a.sex = b.sex, a.age = b.age when not matched then insert (uuid, uname, sex, age,flag) values (b.uuid, b.uname, b.sex, b.age, b.flag)
